pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Hypothesis Tests // Multivariate hypothesis tests and the confidence intervals. This package can be used for hypothesis tests which are The Hotelling T Square Tests (One- Sample, Two Independent Samples, Paired Samples), The One Way MANOVA, The Multivariate Shapiro-Wilk Test for Multivariate Normality Test, The Bartlett Test for One Sample Covariance Matrix, The Box-M Test and The Bartlett's Sphericity Test.
